featureDescriptions.Color of this light expressed as hue/sat: Barva tohoto světla vyjádřená jako odstín/sytost
featureDescriptions.Color of this light in the CIE 1931 colo: Barva tohoto světla v barevném prostoru CIE 1931 (x/y)
featureDescriptions.Color temperature after cold power on of: Barevná teplota po studeném zapnutí tohoto světla
featureDescriptions.Controls the behavior when the device is: Ovládá chování, když je zařízení zapnuté
featureDescriptions.Controls the behaviour when the device i: Ovládá chování, když je zařízení zapnuté
featureDescriptions.Enabling prevents both relais being on a: Povolení zabrání zapnutí obou relé současně
featureDescriptions.Indicates if CO (carbon monoxide) is det: Ukazuje, zda je detekován CO (oxid uhelnatý)
featureDescriptions.Indicates if the battery of this device: Ukazuje, zda je baterie tohoto zařízení téměř vybitá
featureDescriptions.Indicates if the contact is closed (= tr: Ukazuje, zda je kontakt sepnutý (= true) nebo otevřený (= false)
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected a: Ukazuje, zda zařízení detekovalo únik vody
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device is tampered: Ukazuje, zda je se zařízením neoprávněně manipulováno
featureDescriptions.Offset to be used in the local_temperatu: Offset, který má být použit v local_temperature
featureDescriptions.Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. ma: Spustí efekt na světlo (např. nechá světlo na několik sekund blikat)
featureDescriptions.Boost Heating: press and hold \"+\" for: Zesílení ohřevu: stiskněte a podržte tlačítko "+" po dobu 3 sekund, zařízení přejde do režimu zesíleného ohřevu a začne blikat symbol ▷╵◁. V aplikaci se zobrazí odpočítávání.
featureDescriptions.Boost Time Setting 100 sec - 900 sec, (d: Boost Time Setting 100 sec - 900 sec, (default = 300 sec)
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the humidity value (absolute: Kalibruje hodnotu vlhkosti (absolutní odchylka), projeví se při dalším hlášení zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the illuminance value (percen: Kalibruje hodnotu osvětlení (procentuální offset), projeví se při dalším hlášení zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the illuminance_lux value (pe: Kalibruje hodnotu illuminance_lux (procentuální offset), projeví se při další zprávě zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the pressure value (absolute: Kalibruje hodnotu tlaku (absolutní offset), projeví se při dalším hlášení zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the temperature value (absolu: Kalibruje hodnotu teploty (absolutní odchylka), projeví se při dalším hlášení zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Direction of movement from the point of: Direction of movement from the point of view of the radar
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected pr: Indikuje kdy zařízení detekovalo něčí přítomnost
featureDescriptions.Moving inside the range of the sensor: Moving inside the range of the sensor
featureDescriptions.Number of digits after decimal point for: Počet číslic za desetinnou čárkou pro vlhkost, platí při dalším hlášení zařízení.
Počet číslic za desetinnou čárkou pro osvětlení, platí při dalším hlášení zařízení.
Počet číslic za desetinnou čárkou pro illuminance_lux, platí při další zprávě zařízení.
Počet číslic za desetinnou čárkou pro tlak, platí při dalším hlášení zařízení.
Počet číslic za desetinnou čárkou pro teplotu, platí při dalším hlášení zařízení.
featureDescriptions.Presets for sensivity for presence and m: Presets for sensivity for presence and movement
featureDescriptions.PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the d: PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature.
featureDescriptions.Sends a message the last time occupancy: Sends a message the last time occupancy was detected. When setting this for example to [10, 60] a `{"no_occupancy_since": 10}` will be send after 10 seconds and a `{"no_occupancy_since": 60}` after 60 seconds.
featureDescriptions.Set to false to disable the legacy integ: Nastavením na hodnotu Ne zakážete starší integraci (důrazně doporučujeme), změní se struktura publikované užitečné zátěže (výchozí hodnota Ano).
featureDescriptions.Schedule MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the devi: Režim plánu ⏱ - V tomto režimu zařízení provádí přednastavené týdenní vytápění dle nastaveného času vytápění a teploty.
featureDescriptions.This device does not support reporting e: This device does not support reporting electric measurements so it is polled instead. The default poll interval is 60 seconds.
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds after which occupancy is: Time in seconds after which occupancy is cleared after detecting it (default 90 seconds).
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds after which vibration is: Time in seconds after which vibration is cleared after detecting it (default 90 seconds).
featureDescriptions.Controls the transition time (in seconds: Ovládá dobu přechodu (v sekundách) změn zapnutí/vypnutí, jasu, teploty barev (pokud je to možné) a barvy (pokud je to možné). Výchozí hodnota je „0“ (bez přechodu).
featureDescriptions.Simulate a brightness value. If this dev: Simulovat hodnotu jasu. Pokud toto zařízení poskytuje akci bright_move_up nebo bright_move_down, je možné určit interval aktualizace a rozdíl.
featureDescriptions.Delta per interval, 20 by default: Rozdíl v intervalu, ve výchozím nastavení 20
featureDescriptions.Operation mode, select \"command\" to en: Operation mode, select "command" to enable bindings
When enabled colours will be synced, e.g. if the light supports both colour xy and colour temperature a conversion from colour xy to colour temperature will be done when setting the colour xy (default true).
featureDescriptions.Position of the valve (= demanded heat): Poloha ventilu (= požadované teplo), kdy 0 % je zcela zavřeno a 100 % je zcela otevřeno.
featureDescriptions.User ID to set or clear the pincode for: User ID to set or clear the pincode for
featureDescriptions.Type of user, unrestrictied: owner (defa: Type of user, unrestrictied: owner (default), (year|week)_day_schedule: user has ability to open lock based on specific time period, master: user has ability to both program and operate the door lock, non_access: user is recognized by the lock but does not have the ability to open the lock
featureDescriptions.Pincode to set, set pincode to null to c: Pincode to set, set pincode to null to clear
featureDescriptions.Click mode, fast: only supports single c: Click mode, fast: only supports single click which will be send immediately after clicking, multi: supports more events like double and hold
Click mode, fast: only supports single click which will be send immediately after clicking.multi: supports more events like double and hold
featureDescriptions.Enable/disable the power outage memory,: Enable/disable the power outage memory, this recovers the on/off mode after power failure
featureDescriptions.Maximum allowed load, turns off if excee: Maximum allowed load, turns off if exceeded
featureDescriptions.Control both relay and usb or only the r: Control both relay and usb or only the relay with the physical switch button
featureDescriptions.Time interval in seconds to report after: Time interval in seconds to report after light changes
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether a plug is physically a: Indicates whether a plug is physically attached. Device does not have to pull power or even be connected electrically (state of this binary switch can be ON even if main power switch is OFF)
featureDescriptions.Anti flicker mode can be used to solve b: Anti flicker mode can be used to solve blinking issues of some lights.Quick mode makes the device respond faster.
featureDescriptions.Operation mode, select \"command\" to en: Operation mode, select "command" to enable bindings (wake up the device before changing modes!)
featureDescriptions.LCD brightness (will not persist if auto: LCD brightness (will not persist if auto-brightness is enabled)
featureDescriptions.Control which switches are available in: Control which switches are available in the switches screen (none disables switches screen)
featureDescriptions.If the power is constantly lower than 2W: If the power is constantly lower than 2W within half an hour, the plug will be automatically turned off
featureDescriptions.Turn the device automatically off when a: Vypnout zařízení automaticky pokud má připojené zařízení spotřebu méně, než 2W po dobu 20 minut
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds till occupancy goes to f: Time in seconds until occupancy goes to false
featureDescriptions.Detected by sudden temperature drop or s: Detected by sudden temperature drop or set manually.
featureDescriptions.Manually set window_open, ~1 minute to t: Manually set window_open, ~1 minute to take affect.
featureDescriptions.Represents the time taken to move to or: Represents the time taken to move to or from the target level when On of Off commands are received by an On/Off cluster
featureDescriptions.Represents the time taken to move the cu: Represents the time taken to move the current level from the minimum level to the maximum level when an On command is received
Represents the time taken to move the current level from the maximum level to the minimum level when an Off command is received
featureDescriptions.Defines the desired startup level for a: Defines the desired startup level for a device when it is supplied with power
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output the b: Specifies the minimum light output the ballast can achieve.
featureDescriptions.Specifies the maximum light output the b: Specifies the maximum light output the ballast can achieve.
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output of th: Specifies the minimum light output of the ballast
featureDescriptions.Specifies the maximum light output of th: Specifies the maximum light output of the ballast
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output after: Specifies the minimum light output after switching on
featureDescriptions.The dimmer supports AC forward phase con: The dimmer supports AC forward phase control.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer supports AC reverse phase con: The dimmer supports AC reverse phase control.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of measuring the r: The dimmer is capable of measuring the reactance to distinguish inductive and capacitive loads.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of replacing the b: The dimmer is capable of replacing the built-in, default dimming curve.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of detecting an ou: The dimmer is capable of detecting an output overload and shutting the output off.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is currently operating in AC: The dimmer is currently operating in AC forward phase control mode.
The dimmer is currently operating in AC reverse phase control mode.
featureDescriptions.The output is currently turned off, beca: The output is currently turned off, because the dimmer has detected an overload.
featureDescriptions.The dimmer's reactance discriminator had: The dimmer's reactance discriminator had detected a capacitive load.
The dimmer's reactance discriminator had detected an inductive load.
featureDescriptions.Operation mode: \"command\" - for group: Operation mode: "command" - for group control, "event" - for clicks
featureDescriptions.moving inside the range of the sensor: moving inside the range of the sensor
featureDescriptions.direction of movement from the point of: direction of movement from the point of view of the radar
featureDescriptions.presets for sensivity for presence and m: presets for sensivity for presence and movement
featureDescriptions.Device valve is open or closed (heating: Device valve is open or closed (heating or not)
featureDescriptions.MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device: MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device executes manual temperature setting. When the set temperature is lower than the "minimum temperature", the valve is closed (forced closed). AUTO MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. ON - In this mode, the thermostat stays open OFF - In this mode, the thermostat stays closed
featureDescriptions.Auto MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device e: Auto MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature.
featureDescriptions.Setting minimum 0 - maximum 465 seconds: Setting minimum 0 - maximum 465 seconds boost time. The boost (♨) function is activated. The remaining time for the function will be counted down in seconds ( 465 to 0 ).
featureDescriptions.When Anti-Freezing function is activated: When Anti-Freezing function is activated, the temperature in the house is kept at 8 °C ‚the device display "AF".press the pair button to cancel.
featureDescriptions.Battery life can be prolonged by switchi: Battery life can be prolonged by switching the heating off. To achieve this, the valve is closed fully. To activate the heating stop, the device display "HS" ‚press the pair button to cancel.
featureDescriptions.The holiday mode( ⛱ ) will automatically: The holiday mode( ⛱ ) will automatically start at the set time starting point and run the holiday temperature.
featureDescriptions.Auto Mode ⏱ - In this mode, the device e: Auto Mode ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature.
featureDescriptions.Duration in seconds of the alarm: Duration in seconds of the alarm
featureDescriptions.Indicates if the device is moving: Indicates if the device is moving
featureDescriptions.Control status LED when load ON: Control status LED when load ON
featureDescriptions.Control status LED when load OFF: Control status LED when load OFF
featureDescriptions.Controls Capacitive or Inductive Dimming: Controls Capacitive or Inductive Dimming Mode
featureDescriptions.Time the valve was open when state on: Time the valve was open when state on
featureDescriptions.Is the unit in mounting mode. This is se: Is the unit in mounting mode. This is set to `false` for mounted (already on the radiator) or `true` for not mounted (after factory reset)
featureDescriptions.Set the unit mounting mode. `false` Go t: Set the unit mounting mode. `false` Go to Mounted Mode or `true` Go to Mounting Mode
featureDescriptions.Thermostat Orientation. This is importan: Thermostat Orientation. This is important for the PID in how it assesses temperature. `false` Horizontal or `true` Vertical
featureDescriptions.Not clear how this affects operation. `f: Not clear how this affects operation. `false` No Heat Available or `true` Heat Available
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the unit needs warm water: Whether or not the unit needs warm water. `false` No Heat Request or `true` Heat Request
featureDescriptions.Set at maximum 3 hours interval but not: Set at maximum 3 hours interval but not more often than every 30 minutes and 0.1 degrees difference. Resets every 3hours to standard. e.g. 21C = 2100 (-8000=undefined).
featureDescriptions.0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Ho: 0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Hold - Windows are maybe about to open, 3=Open window detected, 4=In window open state from external but detected closed locally
featureDescriptions.Set if the window is open or close. This: Set if the window is open or close. This setting will trigger a change in the internal window and heating demand. `false` (windows are closed) or `true` (windows are open)
featureDescriptions.Exercise trigger time. Minutes since mid: Exercise trigger time. Minutes since midnight (65535=undefined). Range 0 to 1439
featureDescriptions.Scale factor of setpoint filter timecons: Scale factor of setpoint filter timeconstant ("aggressiveness" of control algorithm) 1= Quick ...  5=Moderate ... 10=Slow
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the thermostat acts as st: Whether or not the thermostat acts as standalone thermostat or shares load with other thermostats in the room. The gateway must update load_room_mean if enabled.
featureDescriptions.Mean radiator load for room calculated b: Mean radiator load for room calculated by gateway for load balancing purposes
featureDescriptions.Blink green LED on motion detection: Zablikat zelenou LED při detekci pohybu
featureDescriptions.Ac louver position of this device: Ac louver position of this device
featureDescriptions.Enables/disables frost detection on the: Enables/disables frost detection on the device
featureDescriptions.MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device: MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device executes manual temperature setting. When the set temperature is lower than the "minimum temperature", the valve is closed (forced closed). PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. HOLIDAY MODE ⛱ - In this mode, for example, the vacation mode is set for 10 days and the temperature is setto 15 degrees Celsius. After 10 days, the device will automatically switch to programming mode. TEMPORARY MANUAL MODE - In this mode, ☝ icon will flash. At this time, the device executes the manually set temperature and returns to the weekly programming mode in the next time period.
featureDescriptions.PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the d: PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. You can set up to 4 stages of temperature every for WEEKDAY ➀➁➂➃➄,  SATURDAY ➅ and SUNDAY ➆.
featureDescriptions.The delta between local_temperature and: The delta between local_temperature and current_heating_setpoint to trigger Heat. 1-5
featureDescriptions.Controls behaviour of led/siren on alarm: Controls behaviour of LED/siren on alarm
featureDescriptions.Enable or disable the permanent blue LED: Povolit nebo zakázat stálou modrou LED
featureDescriptions.Enables the LED when the light is on: Povolit LED pokud je světlo zapnuto
featureDescriptions.On/off (works only if device is in \"swi: On/off (works only if device is in "switch" mode)
featureDescriptions.switch: allow on/off, auto will use wire: switch: allow on/off, auto will use wired action via C1/C2 on teleruptor with buttons
switch: allow on/off, auto will use wired action via C1/C2 on contactor for example with HC/HP
featureDescriptions.Filter is older than 6 months and needs: Filter is older than 6 months and needs replacing
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected br: Indicates whether the device detected bright light (works only in night mode)
Prevent changes. `false` = run normally. `true` = prevent from making changes. Must be set to `false` when system_mode = off or `true` for heat
featureDescriptions.Period in minutes for which the setpoint: Period in minutes for which the setpoint hold will be active. 65535 = attribute not used. 0 to 360 to match the remote display
featureDescriptions.Select between direct control of the val: Select between direct control of the valve via the `valve_position` or automatic control of the valve based on the `current_heating_setpoint`. For manual control set the value to 1, for automatic control set the value to 2 (the default). When switched to manual mode the display shows a value from 0 (valve closed) to 100 (valve fully open) and the buttons on the device are disabled.
featureDescriptions.Directly control the radiator valve when: Directly control the radiator valve when `trv_mode` is set to 1. The values range from 0 (valve closed) to 255 (valve fully open)
featureDescriptions.Displayed text on thermostat display (zo: Displayed text on thermostat display (zone). Max 14 characters
featureDescriptions.Load in W when heating is on (between 0-: Load in W when heating is on (between 0-2000 W). The thermostat uses the value as input to the mean_power calculation.
Device in regulator or thermostat mode.
featureDescriptions.When device is in regulator mode this co: When device is in regulator mode this controls the time between each in/out connection. When device is in thermostat mode this controls the  time between each in/out switch when measured temperature is within +-0.5 °C set temperature. Choose a long time for (slow) concrete floors and a short time for (quick) wooden floors.
featureDescriptions.Current temperature measured from the fl: Aktuální teplota měřená z podlahového čidla
featureDescriptions.Set max floor temperature (between 20-35: Set max floor temperature (between 20-35 °C) when "supervisor_floor" is set
featureDescriptions.Reports average power usage last 10 minu: Reports average power usage last 10 minutes
featureDescriptions.When frost guard is ON, it is activated: When frost guard is ON, it is activated when the thermostat is switched OFF with the ON/OFF button.At the same time, the display will fade and the text "Frostsikring x °C" appears in the display and remains until the thermostat is switched on again.
featureDescriptions.Time after last bell to finish ring: Time after last bell to finish ring
featureDescriptions.Current count radioactive pulses per min: Current count radioactive pulses per minute
featureDescriptions.This is applicable if tubes type is set: This is applicable if tubes type is set to other
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device is being te: Indicates whether the device is being tested
featureDescriptions.Turn on/off the strobe (light) for Squaw: Turn on/off the strobe (light) for Squawk
featureDescriptions.Pulses per kwh. Default 1000 imp/kWh. Ra: Pulses per kWh. Default 1000 imp/kWh. Range 0 to 65535
featureDescriptions.Current summation value sent to the disp: Current summation value sent to the display. e.g. 570 = 0,570 kWh
featureDescriptions.Is true if communication problem with me: Platí, pokud dojde k problému s komunikací s měřičem
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device are in faul: Indicates whether the device are in fault state
featureDescriptions.Instantaneous measured electrical curren: Okamžitá naměřená hodnota elektrického proudu na fázi B
featureDescriptions.Measured electrical potential value on p: Naměřená hodnota elektrického proudu na fázi B
featureDescriptions.Instantaneous measured electrical curren: Okamžitá naměřená hodnota elektrického proudu na fázi C
featureDescriptions.Measured electrical potential value on p: Naměřená hodnota elektrického proudu na fázi C
featureDescriptions.Absolute min temperature allowed on the: Absolutní minimální povolená teplota na zařízení
featureDescriptions.Absolute max temperature allowed on the: Absolutní maximální povolená teplota na zařízení
featureDescriptions.Min temperature limit set on the device: Minimální teplotní limit nastavený na zařízení
featureDescriptions.Max temperature limit set on the device: Maximální teplotní limit nastavený na zařízení

groups.new_group_id_placeholder: V případě potřeby zadejte ID skupiny

map.help_coordinator_link_description: Plné čáry jsou spojením s koordinátorem
map.help_lqi_description: Kvalita spojení je mezi 0 - 255 (vyšší je lepší), hodnota s / představuje více typů spojení
map.help_router_links_description: Přerušované čáry jsou spojením se směrovačem
map.loading: V závislosti na velikosti vaší sítě může načtení trvat 10 sekund až 2 minuty.

ota.empty_ota_message: Nemáte žádná zařízení, která podporují OTA

donation_text: Dobrý den, %username%, zde nám můžete poděkovat za tvrdou práci
Neváhej a řekni taky něco hezkého ;)

zigbee.update_Home_assistant_entity_id: Aktualizovat ID entity v Home Assistant

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow new devices to join (re-applied at: Allow new devices to join (re-applied at restart)
You can define external converters to e.g. add support for a DiY device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an active device will b: Time after which an active device will be marked as offline in minutes
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Options for passive devices (mostly batt: Options for passive devices (mostly battery powered)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an passive device will: Time after which an passive device will be marked as offline in minutes
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT mes: MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT messages
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TL: MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TLS connection)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of: Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of CA used to sign server and client certificates
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-: Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-authentication
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for: Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for client-authentication
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Include device information to mqtt messa: Include device information to mqtt messages
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable retain for all send messages. ON: Disable retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if you MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of the adapter. To autodetect t: Location of the adapter. To autodetect the port, set null
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable LED of the adapter if supported: Disable LED of the adapter if supported
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter type, not needed unless you are: Adapter type, not needed unless you are experiencing problems
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Block devices from the network (by ieeeA: Block devices from the network (by ieeeAddr)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow only certain devices to join the n: Allow only certain devices to join the network (by ieeeAddr). Note that all devices not on the passlist will be removed from the network!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Transmit power of adapter, only availabl: Transmit power of adapter, only available for Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352) adapters, CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 max is = 20dbm (5dbm default)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Examples when 'state' of a device is pub: Examples when 'state' of a device is published json: topic: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' attribute: topic 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: both json and attribute (see above)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ZigBee pan ID, changing requires repairi: ZigBee pan ID, changing requires repairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee extended pan ID, changing require: Zigbee extended pan ID, changing requires repairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee channel, changing requires repair: Zigbee channel, changing requires repairing all devices! (Note: use a ZLL channel: 11, 15, 20, or 25 to avoid Problems)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT message payload will contain all at: MQTT message payload will contain all attributes, not only changed ones. Has to be true when integrating via Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Persist cached state, only used when cac: Persist cached state, only used when cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Send cached state on startup, only used: Send cached state on startup, only used when cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Create symlink to current logs in the lo: Create symlink to current logs in the log directory
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: Output location of the log, leave empty to supress logging
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log file name, can also contain timestam: Log file name, can also contain timestamp
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Baud rate speed for serial port, this ca: Baud rate speed for serial port, this can be anything firmware support but default is 115200 for Z-Stack and EZSP, 38400 for Deconz, however note that some EZSP firmware need 57600
settingsSchemaDescriptions.RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for seri: RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for serial port
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Network encryption key, changing require: Network encryption key, changing requires repairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messag: Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messages, contains date/time of last Zigbee message
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT message: Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT messages, contains milliseconds since the previous msg
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy entity attributes,: Home Assistant legacy entity attributes, when enabled Zigbee2MQTT will add state attributes to each entity, additional to the separate entities and devices it already creates
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 o: Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 or 16 for CC26X2R1) (default: null, uses recommended value)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Use IKEA TRADFRI OTA test server, see OT: Use IKEA TRADFRI OTA test server, see OTA updates documentation
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy triggers, when ena: Home Assistant legacy triggers, when enabled Zigbee2mqt will send an empty 'action' or 'click' after one has been send. A 'sensor_action' and 'sensor_click' will be discoverd
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The host running syslogd, defaults to lo: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The port on the host that syslog is runn: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The network protocol to log over (e.g. t: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, etc).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.PID of the process that log messages are: PID of the process that log messages are coming from (Default process.pid).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Host to indicate that log messages are c: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The type of the syslog protocol to use (: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD, also valid: 5424).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The name of the application (Default: Zi: The name of the application (Default: Zigbee2MQTT).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The end of line character to be added to: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Message without modifications).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Your device may request a check for a ne: Your device may request a check for a new firmware update. This value determines how frequently third party servers may actually be contacted to look for firmware updates. The value is set in minutes, and the default is 1 day.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee devices may request a firmware up: Zigbee devices may request a firmware update, and do so frequently, causing Zigbee2MQTT to reach out to third party servers. If you disable these device initiated checks, you can still initiate a firmware update check manually.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By d: Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By default this is the device ID
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Retain MQTT messages of this device: Retain MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds,: Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds, Make sure to set mqtt.version to 5
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this devi: QoS level for MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Protects unique payload values of specif: Protects unique payload values of specified payload properties from overriding within debounce time
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes from optimistic publis: Filter attributes from optimistic publish payload when calling /set. (This has no effect if optimistic is set to false).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The user-defined device icon for the fro: The user-defined device icon for the frontend. It can be a link to an image (not a path to a file) or base64 encoded data URL like: image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB3aW....R0aD

settingsSchemaTitles.IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url: IKEA TRADFRI OTA použije test url
